name: Zacharia Magriplis Prototypes
description:
Game 1-  This game is a simple processing visual effect i was going to have as an storm for the seasons. 

Game 2- This is a simple jumping platformer type of game that is based in outer space. Your an astronaut trying to see how far in space you can go. this is a very small and fun game that can be enjoyed by multiple people.

Game 3-   2D style multiplayer racer which is where the player's main goal is to try to eliminated your enemies by pushing them into the traffic coming forward. the player has the power to shot the on coming traffic. using the same keyboard as controls. 

Game 4- The player controls the courser by doing something of the color black so don't play this game at night. this is neon style slasher game which is really  fun and difficult game to play.
